programme.title: Live Formula 1
programme.sub-title: Formula 1 Bahrain Grand Prix Qualifying Live.
programme.desc: Steve Jones presents from the Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir, as the third round of the season continues. Then-world champion Lewis Hamilton claimed pole position for Mercedes here in 2016, ahead of team-mate Nico Rosberg and Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel in third. The Brit would go on to finish the race in third, however, with the other Ferrari of Kimi Raikkonen finishing in second place and Rosberg claiming top spot.(n)

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedy actor Jack Dee embark on a clock-conscious exploration of the Italian city, enjoying two days rich in humour, history, culture and pizza. The pair start with a guided tour on vintage Vespas amid the city's chaotic traffic, attend a pizza-making class and then head to the volcanic ruins of Herculaneum. Day two sees them visit the Isle of Capri and play the lottery using la smorfia, a local guide to the meaning of dreams.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.title: The Book Thief
programme.desc: Premiere. A girl separated from her family is raised by foster parents in Nazi Germany, who instill in her a love of reading. She is horrified by the book burnings and tries to save volumes from the flames, while she and her adoptive family provide a safe hiding place for a Jewish boy. Drama based on Markus Zusak's novel, starring Sophie Nelisse, Geoffrey Rush and Emily Watson.(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Biopic of mathematician Alan Turing, whose work during the Second World War translated seemingly unbreakable Nazi codes as well as pioneering the development of computer technology. In the years following the war, his life would be destroyed as his homosexuality was discovered, leaving him facing criminal charges. Starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: A Jewish prince in first-century Jerusalem is reunited with an old Roman friend, who is now the governor of Judea. However, their differing political views over local dissent leads to a bitter quarrel, and the governor uses the pretext of an accident to sell him into slavery and imprison his mother and sister. Years later, the prince returns, determined to seek revenge and find his missing family. Oscar-winning epic, starring Charlton Heston, Stephen Boyd and Haya Harareet.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: David enjoys getting to know his new father and takes a big step forward with his life. Amy distracts herself from her relationship woes with Leo by helping Jack out at the church.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Tori admits she is contemplating moving to the city with Riley, while Mason asks Olivia to go on a road trip and Alf is delighted that Irene seems to be bonding with her grandchild.(n)

programme.title: Last Days of Jesus
programme.desc: Documentary re-examining the crucifixion, revealing the events that may have sparked Jesus' religious movement including the death of John the Baptist and an increasing resentment among the people towards the religious authorities' opulent lifestyles and obedience to Rome. The programme also examines how power was shifting in the highest reaches of the Roman Empire, while archaeologists reveal new findings concerning Jesus' execution.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: The presenter reaches the North Yorkshire Moors and takes to the skies for a bird's-eye view of the journey ahead from the cockpit of a glider from the Sutton Bank gliding club. Back on the ground, he admires the ruins of Rievaulx Abbey and learns the tale of power and greed that eventually brought down the monastery. In the orchards of Ampleforth Abbey, where rare heritage varieties are grown to produce juice and cider, Tony discovers a secret that evokes vivid memories of his childhood.(n)

programme.title: Spectacular Spain with Alex Polizzi
programme.desc: Alex arrives in the popular holiday region of Andalucia and begins her exploration at the Tabernas desert in Almeria, a striking and unusual part of Spain has featured in countless spaghetti westerns. She then moves further west to the green and fertile mountains of La Alpujarra in the foothills of the Sierra Nevada mountain range, a region famous for its tranquil retreats and alleged healing waters.(n)

programme.title: The World's Most Luxurious Cruise Ship
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary following engineers and designers as they construct the liner Seven Seas Explorer. The aim of cruise boss Frank Del Rio is to make it the most luxurious ship of its type, designed to convey 750 passengers when others of its size would hold 5,000. Building the £360million vessel is a race against time for Italian shipbuilders Fincantieri, as tickets for the maiden voyage go on sale long before it is finished. The most expensive suite boasts a grand piano, a butler and its own spa, and costs £8,000 per night, while the owner is spending £5million on art works to furnish the rooms.(n)

programme.desc: The doctors treat a series of patients with broken bones and open wounds, including a man involved in a motorcycle accident just three days earlier, and a woman with an abscess on her upper leg and groin. The doctors also deal with Gary, who underwent facial surgery to remove a cancerous tumour from his jaw.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Winter.
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on. Cameras also follow the progress of many short-eared owls which land on the moors after the long flight over the north sea from northern Europe. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice visits Essex to offer advice to a Colchester couple unable to snap up their dream home until they can sell their current house. Unfortunately, after four months on the market, there is still no buyer for the three-bedroom detached property - which comes complete with a wild colour scheme.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow examines the life and legacy of German painter Albrecht Durer, who set a new benchmark in self-portraiture and raised the artistic reputation of northern Europe to a level rivaling that of Renaissance Italy. Like his contemporary Leonardo da Vinci, Durer perceived the world with a scientist's eye, and his detailed studies of plants and animals remain unrivalled to this day.(n)

programme.title: Nick's Quest
programme.desc: Nick Baker examines the habits of the great white shark, which can grow to 20ft in length. From the safety of an underwater cage, he has an encounter with one of the creatures off the Western Cape of South Africa. He also swims with fur seals and penguins.(n)

programme.desc: The interceptors are forced to intervene when a pair of thugs cause trouble on a high street. PC Dan Briggenshaw pursues a shoplifter fleeing on a scooter, but ends up facing a life-threatening predicament thanks to a teenager's dangerous driving.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Barry Peach outsmarts a disqualified driver, handler Jon Peacock takes his new sniffer dog Jack to carry out a drugs warrant, Carl Warrener makes a jaw-dropping discovery when he pulls a car over in the early hours and Brian Conville gets mobbed when he deals with a reckless learner driver.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on three couples living on benefits. They include Karen and Paul who once ran a launderette, but after losing their business they now struggle to get by on benefits. Yvonne and David are getting married and planning to make it the best day ever - despite only being paid in a year the same amount as the cost of the average UK wedding. Things are even more bleak for Brian and Rachel, however, as despite being together for 10 years, they cannot afford to move in together.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: The documentary meets claimants living on the breadline in Yorkshire. They include 45-year-old Alex, who dreams of making it as a DJ and has just blown thousands of pounds on record decks, and Geordie couple Michelle and Thomas, who are now living in Leeds, where they are pushing for their children to have a better future. Plus, a Whitby man who says the sickness benefit he receives is only enough to feed his partner and baby daughter five days out of every seven.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: People coping with medical conditions on top of their financial difficulties, featuring a family of four from Whitby who include a father with Tourette's and an autistic son. In Doncaster, a woman with cerebral palsy needs round-the-clock care, but that does not stop her campaigning for animal rights, while in Barnsley, a hoarder with a flat full of clutter has been deemed fit to work despite her arthritis - and now she has the bailiffs chasing her.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Claire and Simon seek eviction specialist Chris's help to evict a man claiming to be renting their old family home. Meanwhile, Hamza hopes to get his council flat back after he tried to help a neighbour's friend by letting them stay for a week, but ended up being shut out when they refused to leave. Plus, a man is almost £30k in debt and in danger of repossession after his tenants stopped paying the rent.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court Enforcement Agents Paul and Steve are sent to north London to evict a young Romanian mother who owes £6,000 in unpaid rent, but when they arrive, they discover a family home that is not quite what it appears to be. Meanwhile, in Kent, Brian and Alan turn up the pressure on a debtor who has admitted to owing more than £7,000, but claims he cannot afford to pay up - despite having a garage full of expensive tools. Later, in south-west London, Brian accompanies Delroy as he tries to recover a £400,000 debt from a residential property, and when the pair trace the defaulter to an upmarket cafe, the man in charge lies about his identity.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents have an explosive run-in with a debtor as they try to retrieve £1,800 owed by a car dealership, and in Derbyshire, two officers try to collect more than £1,500 in unpaid parking fines. Elsewhere, Max and Paul are in London as they attempt to recover £2,000 owed by a property company, but an employee refuses to let them enter.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part two of two. Kensi goes in search of her father's killer, before bumping into her mother, who she has not seen for more than 15 years. Meanwhile, the discovery that a member of Kensi's father's unit faked his own death prompts Granger to back down from his suspicions of his colleague. Crime drama, starring Daniela Ruah and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team looks into a raid on a naval base, and Dr Cyril Taft - the surgeon who saved Gibbs' life - experiences the thrill of assisting on an investigation. Assigned to treat Gibbs' suspect, Taft manages to uncover evidence that may prove crucial to solving the case. Meanwhile, DiNozzo pays his old flame Jeanne Benoit a visit as he chases a lead involving doctors in Sudan. Guest starring John Cryer and Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Most Shocking Celebrity Moments
programme.desc: A look back at the noughties, which witnessed the birth of reality TV and some bizarre scenes caught on camera - from George Galloway's turn as a cat in Celebrity Big Brother, to Katie Price and Peter Andre's love affair and Gillian McKeith's fit of the vapours on I'm a Celebrity. It was also the decade that saw Susan Boyle shock the judges on Britain's Got Talent, Miley Cyrus cause a storm at the VMAs, Robbie Williams rejoin Take That, and Kate Moss dabble with cocaine. There are also reflections on incidents involving Tiger Woods, Lance Armstrong and Wayne Rooney.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: The Clearing
programme.desc: Industrialist Wayne is kidnapped by a former employee. While her husband hikes through the woods with his hands bound, wife Eileen reflects on her marriage and their love(n)

programme.title: How High
programme.desc: The Ivy League will never be the same in this crazy comedy about two underachieving stoners who finagle their way into Harvard with the help of a strain of weed that conjures up their deceased brainiac friend(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The extraordinary mathematical mind of John Forbes Nash Jr draws him into the world of Cold War spies. But how much of Nash's fearful work is a product of his paranoia? Compelling drama of a troubled and brilliant man(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: An uptight college dean is determined to have his most unruly frat house expelled, enlisting the help of the most respectable house on campus. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: After an accident in space, an astronaut's pregnant wife suspects he is no longer the same man(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller about a sleazy book dealer endeavouring to locate a rare occult work. The dealer is hired by a wealthy bibliophile to locate the two remaining copies of a 17th-century book entitled The Nine Gates to the Kingdom of Shadows. As he travels from New York to Madrid and Paris, he learns that the book is rumoured to have been written by the Devil - and to contain the key to conjuring him up(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realize that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: American army chiefs begin to commit troops to Vietnam in 1964, starting with Lt Colonel Hal Moore and his Air Calvary Division. Training begins, and Moore's wife Julie joins the army wives to see the men off to battle. Arriving in South Vietnam they are assigned a search-and-destroy mission on rural land. Another platoon spots the enemy and gives chase, unaware they are heading toward a stronghold of the North Vietnamese army. Stranded under fire, the pressure is on for Moore's men, who fortify their position and begin a long, intense battle to save their comrades. It is the first of many such encounters in a brutal conflict..(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Maverick cop Harry Callahan investigates a series of brutal murders linked to a macabre gambling game that involves predicting celebrities' deaths(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: (1987) Oliver Stone's morality tale stars Charlie Sheen as Bud Fox, an ambitious young stockbroker, who's willing to do whatever it takes to emulate his hero, supremely wealthy financier Gordon Gekko (Michael Douglas). Bud's initial attempts to play the market honestly don't light his touchpaper to success. But, when he passes on some insider information to Gekko, his career starts to pick up pace and, as he becomes increasingly embroiled in illegal trading and financial espionage, he begins to make the money of his dreams. However, he fails to fully comprehend the true cost of his deals until one of them threatens the livelihood of his union boss father (Martin Sheen). Also starring Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp. M,W,R(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: An egotistical TV reporter learns to appreciate the good things in life thanks to an eccentric, homeless clairvoyant in this old-fashioned romantic comedy from director Stephen Herek (Mr. Holland's Opus). Seattle native Lanie Kerrigan (Angelina Jolie) has spent most of her adult existence trying to live down her gawky, geeky adolescence: She toils for hours at the gym to keep cellulite at bay; she's managed to snag an engagement to a star baseball player (Christian Kane); and through her chipper puff pieces on the nightly news, she's cultivated a loyal following of couch potatoes who pester her for autographs. She's ready to take the next step to national news when her boss suggests she further hone her skills with ace cameraman Pete Scanlon (Edward Burns), who also happens to be an old flame of Lanie's. Her comfortable but shallow existence begins to change the moment she and Pete do a story on Prophet Jack (Tony Shaloub), a sage soothsayer who spouts unusually accurate predictions to passers-by in exchange for spare change. Jack offers up the theory that Lanie will not get her cushy promotion; in fact, he says she'll die within a week. When Jack's other prophecies start coming true, Lanie starts living each day as if it were her last -- much to the dismay of her co-workers and her fiancé(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Conservative Welton Academy is enlivened by the arrival of a charismatic English teacher who inspires his students with unconventional methods and philosophies(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship Essex struggle for their survival after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: Landmark horror starring Linda Blair as a young girl possessed by a demonic entity, who can only be saved by an exorcism performed by two priests(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: (2008) Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy and Morgan Freeman star in this violent action adventure from Russian director Timur Bekmambetov (Nightwatch, Daywatch). The life of office worker Wesley Gibson (McAvoy) has been one of frustration, disappointment and anxiety; he has an overbearing boss, his girlfriend and his best friend are duplicitously having an affair, and he's on medication to calm his nerves. To top it all, he one day finds himself on the wrong end of an assassination attempt. Luckily, the agile, honed and lethal Fox (Jolie) is at hand to save his life. However, she also reveals that his recently deceased father was secretly a supremely skilled killer, and that it's her job to ensure that Wesley takes his place in the Fraternity, the mystical organisation overseen by Sloan (Freeman), which exists to rid the world of evil-doers. And so begins Wesley's journey to unlock his hitherto unsuspected innate deadly abilities and use them for good. The cinematography echoes the inventiveness of Bekmambetov's earlier movies and takes a Matrix-like delight in playing with the tempo and camera angles of the fight scenes(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home in this nostalgic and moving romance(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Director Baz Luhrmann offers a western-cum-war-adventure-cum-romance hybrid that's set in the Australian outback and stars Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. It is 1939 and Lady Sarah Ashley has travelled halfway round the world to persuade her husband to sell his cattle station and return back home to Blighty. But she hasn't anticipated the primitive realities of life in northern Australia, nor has her upbringing prepared her for an encounter with the likes of the rough and ready Drover who is instructed to chaperone her from Darwin to the ranch. But the pair are fated to become much more closely acquainted than either could have imagined. The plot also encompasses the lot of the region's Aboriginal people, via the plight of local lad Nullah, and the first Japanese attacks on the northern territories(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy (Levi Miller) discovers his destiny as Peter Pan in this vividly realized fantasy, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard (Hugh Jackman) with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily (Rooney Mara). Directed by Joe Wright (Hanna) and Atonement). Cast includes Garrett Hedlund, Amanda Seyfried, Adeel Akhtar, Nonso Anozie and Kathy Burke(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this high-octane action sequel, hit man Arthur Bishop is forced to come out of retirement and commit three difficult assassinations in order to rescue his kidnapped lover. The hardest part: He must make all of the killings look like accidents(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex. Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: The Clearing

programme.desc: The extraordinary mathematical mind of John Forbes Nash Jr draws him into the world of Cold War spies. But how much of Nash's fearful work is a product of his paranoia? Compelling drama of a troubled and brilliant man(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: After an accident in space, an astronaut's pregnant wife suspects he is no longer the same man(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller about a sleazy book dealer endeavouring to locate a rare occult work. The dealer is hired by a wealthy bibliophile to locate the two remaining copies of a 17th-century book entitled The Nine Gates to the Kingdom of Shadows. As he travels from New York to Madrid and Paris, he learns that the book is rumoured to have been written by the Devil - and to contain the key to conjuring him up(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realize that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: American army chiefs begin to commit troops to Vietnam in 1964, starting with Lt Colonel Hal Moore and his Air Calvary Division. Training begins, and Moore's wife Julie joins the army wives to see the men off to battle. Arriving in South Vietnam they are assigned a search-and-destroy mission on rural land. Another platoon spots the enemy and gives chase, unaware they are heading toward a stronghold of the North Vietnamese army. Stranded under fire, the pressure is on for Moore's men, who fortify their position and begin a long, intense battle to save their comrades. It is the first of many such encounters in a brutal conflict..(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Maverick cop Harry Callahan investigates a series of brutal murders linked to a macabre gambling game that involves predicting celebrities' deaths(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: (1987) Oliver Stone's morality tale stars Charlie Sheen as Bud Fox, an ambitious young stockbroker, who's willing to do whatever it takes to emulate his hero, supremely wealthy financier Gordon Gekko (Michael Douglas). Bud's initial attempts to play the market honestly don't light his touchpaper to success. But, when he passes on some insider information to Gekko, his career starts to pick up pace and, as he becomes increasingly embroiled in illegal trading and financial espionage, he begins to make the money of his dreams. However, he fails to fully comprehend the true cost of his deals until one of them threatens the livelihood of his union boss father (Martin Sheen). Also starring Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp. M,W,R(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: An egotistical TV reporter learns to appreciate the good things in life thanks to an eccentric, homeless clairvoyant in this old-fashioned romantic comedy from director Stephen Herek (Mr. Holland's Opus). Seattle native Lanie Kerrigan (Angelina Jolie) has spent most of her adult existence trying to live down her gawky, geeky adolescence: She toils for hours at the gym to keep cellulite at bay; she's managed to snag an engagement to a star baseball player (Christian Kane); and through her chipper puff pieces on the nightly news, she's cultivated a loyal following of couch potatoes who pester her for autographs. She's ready to take the next step to national news when her boss suggests she further hone her skills with ace cameraman Pete Scanlon (Edward Burns), who also happens to be an old flame of Lanie's. Her comfortable but shallow existence begins to change the moment she and Pete do a story on Prophet Jack (Tony Shaloub), a sage soothsayer who spouts unusually accurate predictions to passers-by in exchange for spare change. Jack offers up the theory that Lanie will not get her cushy promotion; in fact, he says she'll die within a week. When Jack's other prophecies start coming true, Lanie starts living each day as if it were her last -- much to the dismay of her co-workers and her fiancé(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Conservative Welton Academy is enlivened by the arrival of a charismatic English teacher who inspires his students with unconventional methods and philosophies(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship Essex struggle for their survival after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: Landmark horror starring Linda Blair as a young girl possessed by a demonic entity, who can only be saved by an exorcism performed by two priests(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: (2008) Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy and Morgan Freeman star in this violent action adventure from Russian director Timur Bekmambetov (Nightwatch, Daywatch). The life of office worker Wesley Gibson (McAvoy) has been one of frustration, disappointment and anxiety; he has an overbearing boss, his girlfriend and his best friend are duplicitously having an affair, and he's on medication to calm his nerves. To top it all, he one day finds himself on the wrong end of an assassination attempt. Luckily, the agile, honed and lethal Fox (Jolie) is at hand to save his life. However, she also reveals that his recently deceased father was secretly a supremely skilled killer, and that it's her job to ensure that Wesley takes his place in the Fraternity, the mystical organisation overseen by Sloan (Freeman), which exists to rid the world of evil-doers. And so begins Wesley's journey to unlock his hitherto unsuspected innate deadly abilities and use them for good. The cinematography echoes the inventiveness of Bekmambetov's earlier movies and takes a Matrix-like delight in playing with the tempo and camera angles of the fight scenes(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home in this nostalgic and moving romance(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Director Baz Luhrmann offers a western-cum-war-adventure-cum-romance hybrid that's set in the Australian outback and stars Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. It is 1939 and Lady Sarah Ashley has travelled halfway round the world to persuade her husband to sell his cattle station and return back home to Blighty. But she hasn't anticipated the primitive realities of life in northern Australia, nor has her upbringing prepared her for an encounter with the likes of the rough and ready Drover who is instructed to chaperone her from Darwin to the ranch. But the pair are fated to become much more closely acquainted than either could have imagined. The plot also encompasses the lot of the region's Aboriginal people, via the plight of local lad Nullah, and the first Japanese attacks on the northern territories(n)

programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May immerse themselves in nostalgia and try to prove that hot hatches from their younger days are better than today's equivalents. programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Newly qualified midwife Jenny Lee prepares to begin her career and is posted to Nonnatus House in London, but what she assumed was a small private hospital turns out to be a nursing convent in the East End. Initially daunted by her new colleagues and surroundings, she slowly finds her feet and is given her first case - the care of a woman pregnant for the 25th time. Jessica Raine, Jenny Agutter, Pam Ferris and Judy Parfitt star in the drama, set in the 1950s and based on the best-selling memoirs of Jennifer Worth.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny sets out to help a heavily pregnant teenage girl who escaped an abusive life in Ireland and made her way to London, only to be taken in by a cafe owner who forced her into prostitution. Meanwhile, new midwife Chummy (Miranda Hart) arrives at Nonnatus House, and despite an overwhelming eagerness to please, she makes slow progress - a problem not helped by her inability to ride a bicycle. Jessica Raine and Amy McAllister co-star in the period medical drama.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny is placed on the district nursing roster to improve her experience of community practice, and grows close to an ailing veteran soldier (guest star Roy Hudd). Trixie and Cynthia welcome a new patient to the antenatal clinic, a fortysomething woman who is upset by her pregnancy, despite her husband's joy. But at the birth, everyone gets a surprise. Drama, with Jessica Raine, Laura Main, Bryony Hannah and Miranda Hart.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: A baby girl, recently delivered by Jenny, is snatched from her pram, uniting the community in a desperate search for the missing child. A newlywed couple are excited about becoming parents - but when the wife develops a serious medical condition, their chances of happiness are jeopardised. Jessica Raine, Bryony Hannah and Miranda Hart star in the 1950s-set nursing drama, with Thomasin Rand and Tom Goodman-Hill.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny befriends Nonnatus House cleaner Peggy and her brother Frank, who has cancer, and learns all about the siblings' upbringing in the workhouse and the effect it has had on their relationship. Meanwhile, Fred has a new money-making venture - a pig called Evie - but his hopes of bringing home the bacon are scuppered when it turns out the porker is pregnant, so the midwives rally round to deliver the piglets.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Monica Joan develops pneumonia after being found mysteriously wandering near the docks - but things only gets worse when she is accused of theft and faces the prospect of prison. Chummy's mother arrives to meet PC Noakes, but when the visit is less than a success, the midwife suffers a crisis of confidence and breaks off her relationship - leaving Jenny and the others trying to persuade her she is making a terrible mistake. Judy Parfitt, Miranda Hart and Jessica Raine star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The nuns find a newborn baby on the steps of the convent. The discovery prompts the community to rally round, providing food and clothing for the unexpected arrival. But the question remains - who is his mother and why did she leave him there? While the investigation gets under way, Jenny gets caught up in the mystery surrounding semi-vagrant local Mrs Jenkins, and the newly married Chummy pulls out all the stops to mount a successful children's nativity play. Jessica Raine, Miranda Hart, Pam Ferris and Jenny Agutter star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The nuns and midwives move into their new premises following the explosion that wrecked the old Nonnatus House, and are joined by fresh arrival Sister Winifred - a kindly-but-naive young woman. Jenny becomes concerned about new mother Merle's mental state and the welfare of her baby, who isn't feeding properly. Dr Turner believes it could be something more serious - although the mystery is eventually solved by the last person anyone would have expected. Chummy is struggling to adjust to her new role as a housewife and mother, and organises an open day at the community centre. Jessica Raine, Stephen McGann and Miranda Hart star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Trixie's feathers are ruffled when Jenny is promoted, but the new Acting Sister has more to worry about after a mother-to-be reveals the baby she is carrying was not fathered by her husband - and to complicate matters, the real father is black. Cynthia is inspired by a lecture on natural childbirth, convinced it will help an overly anxious patient, while Alec and his friends try to persuade Jenny to join them on a CND march. Jessica Raine, Helen George and Bryony Hannah star in the 1950s-set nursing drama.(n)

programme.desc: Alan Davies stars in a feature-length episode of the offbeat crime drama. Master of illusion Jonathan is called upon to solve several disappearances inside the gloomy attic of a vast Gothic house, but is completely baffled by the mystery, which for 70 years has been attributed to the ghost of a madman said to prey upon human flesh. When two women shelter from a thunderstorm there one night, the ominous presence claims another victim, leaving her friend - Joey Ross - determined to get to the truth of what happened. Jonathan finds himself working alongside Joey, and it seems his formidable powers of deduction are in danger of being eclipsed by her raw intuition. With Sheridan Smith as Joey.(n)

Lacey Turner, best known as EastEnders' Stacey Branning, guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny has an eventful few days, starting with a patient who as well as having herself to worry about, is also struggling to cope with her mother, an agoraphobic who hasn't been outside for at least 12 years. On top of that, Alec asks the midwife to accompany him to Brighton for the weekend, leaving her wondering if his intentions are strictly honourable. However, things soon take a tragic turn. Meanwhile, Shelagh joins the local choir to take her mind off her problems. Jessica Raine, Leo Staar and Laura Main star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The nuns and midwives are busy preparing for Sister Evangelina's surprise jubilee celebrations, marking 50 years since she took her vows, but a face from the past threatens to ruin the party for the guest of honour. It's back to business when a young woman with Down's syndrome is brought in feeling unwell. To everyone's surprise, they discover she is six months pregnant, causing some of them to think the worst, and the staff are joined by new nurse Patsy, whose sense of humour and no-nonsense attitude make her an instant hit.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Trixie is chuffed when local curate Tom invites her to join him for a day of cricket, sending her to work with a spring in her step. Is love on the cards for the young midwife? Shelagh's infertility has made her think long and hard about what she wants in life, so she approaches her husband with an idea, while Patsy upsets a young mother in the clinic and is moved to the district rota, where she works tirelessly to diagnose a docker's unusual symptoms.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Cynthia is concerned during a visit as she feels new mum Pamela is overly anxious, so Dr Turner arranges for a psychiatrist to come in. However, they soon discover both mother and baby have gone missing. Meanwhile, Jenny, on secondment, begins to see cracks in the establishment, Chummy discovers her mother has walked out on her father, and Trixie struggles to hide her disappointment when Tom cancels a date. Guest starring Sophie Rundle (The Bletchley Circle).(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny is assigned to first-time mother Jeanette, who requires frequent visits during a protracted labour, and when she meets her patient's cousin, Philip, a new friendship begins to grow for the midwife. Meanwhile, Chummy worries about her mother's illness when she discovers Lady Browne has discharged herself from hospital. Jessica Raine and Miranda Hart star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: It's Christmas time in Poplar and love is in the air as Jenny's relationship with Alec continues to blossom, while Shelagh is planning her quiet wedding to Dr Turner. However, the peace is suddenly disturbed when the police arrive at Nonnatus House to announce an unexploded bomb has been discovered just around the corner and everybody in the district is being evacuated to safety. The electricity has been cut off and the streets are pitch-black, and with the locals scurrying to safety, the nuns and nurses reach out to anyone in need of medical help. The spirit of the Blitz takes over as the community's members pull together - aware that, at any moment, their homes could be reduced to rubble. Jessica Raine, Jenny Agutter, Pam Ferris and Laura Main star in a festive special of the 1950s-set drama, with a guest appearance by comedian Sandi Toksvig.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Easter approaches in the spring of 1961, and Patsy helps to deliver a baby that is born with severe deformities. Her husband struggles to cope with his daughter's needs, but the sisters rally round to support the family. Trixie teaches a keep fit class which results in a medical emergency, leaving her determined to teach her patients to understand their own bodies.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Barbara treats a pregnant woman whose dockworker husband is struggling to support her as opportunities for work dry up. She is forced into a difficult decision that leaves Barbara facing the biggest test of her career. programme.title: Mapp and Lucia
programme.desc: Miss Elizabeth Mapp reigns supreme in the picturesque town of Tilling, and has even more reason to gloat than usual when she lets her house for the summer to a very desirable tenant - Mrs Emmeline Lucas, known to her friends as Lucia. However, when the newcomer proves more popular with the locals than expected, Mapp is left out in the cold, leading to a constant battle for supremacy over bridge parties, garden fetes, art competitions and even the odd yoga class. Period comedy, starring Miranda Richardson and Anna Chancellor. Written by co-star Steve Pemberton, based on the comic novels by EF Benson.(n)

Master of illusion Jonathan is called upon to solve several disappearances inside the gloomy attic of a vast Gothic house, but is completely baffled by the mystery, which for 70 years has been attributed to the ghost of a madman said to prey upon human flesh. When two women shelter from a thunderstorm there one night, the ominous presence claims another victim, leaving her friend - Joey Ross - determined to get to the truth of what happened. Jonathan finds himself working alongside Joey, and it seems his formidable powers of deduction are in danger of being eclipsed by her raw intuition. With Sheridan Smith as Joey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey land themselves in a financial mess when they accidentally overspend on a night out. Adam is upset by Russell who decides to teach him a lesson, and by Jennifer who names someone else as her emergency contact. Patrick Warburton and Oliver Hudson star.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff decides to flirt with a colleague, but when she indicates she wants an affair, he accidentally sends a text message to Audrey trying to put her off becoming involved with him. Russell asks Timmy to retrieve his mobile phone from the apartment where he spent the night with a female friend.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel begins a relationship with a younger man, while Lennox faces a challenge from one of her classmates when she takes up the post of editor of the school blog. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Billie suffers painful childhood flashbacks while fighting a demon and decides to confide in the sisters. Meanwhile, Paige turns to the Elders for help in dealing with the media, and Phoebe admits to Dex that she is a witch. Starring Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Clips on the theme of hair, including cats getting a trim, a hairy fishing rod, and a curling tutorial. Plus, the daily routine of a snake pit cleaner and a human billboard.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily and Marshall arrange for Ted to go on a blind date on Valentine's Day. Robin receives an unwanted surprise from Don, while Barney thinks of an innovative way to get women to call him - by holding up his phone number during the Super Bowl.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted is humiliated when he sees Tiffany out with a man on an evening they had planned to spend together, confirming his friends' suspicions that he is being strung along. Meanwhile, Lily tries to let down one of her colleagues gently. American comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Pops gets a surprise visit from his older sister at Thanksgiving, to the delight of everyone except Ruby, who cannot stand her former sister-in-law.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray orders the cluttered garage be cleared out, although he insists on keeping one trunk that he is particularly sentimental about. Adam and Barry tease Erica mercilessly after discovering her old collection of New Kids on the Block memorabilia.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica asks Beverly to help her find Barry a date for a school dance, but is surprised by her mother's reaction. Meanwhile, Adam gets into a heated argument with Pops.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adam passes on a family ring to convey his feelings for Dana, Beverly has difficulty accepting her son has such deep emotions at his tender age. Problems ensue when Lainey and Barry convince Murray to watch American football with Lainey's father. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Fredrik and Olivia's relationship hangs in the balance as Mimi watches on from the sidelines, while Louise and Rosie help Binky prepare for motherhood with a spot of baby shopping.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's new boyfriend George throws a party so that she can meet his friends, while Joe confronts his ex-wife after she takes her date to a location that was significant in their relationship. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel contemplates the future of her relationship as George is offered an amazing new job abroad, while Ryder's relationship is also becoming more serious as he meets Holly's parents. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's father returns to the town to lobby for a bill that his daughter is strongly opposed to. Elsewhere, some of Lennox's poems catch the attention of a popular classmate who wants to become a singer. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe's younger half-brother Tony visits and Mel is so impressed by his photography work that she asks him to take some pictures of her. Meanwhile, Lennox tries to avoid an unwell Ryder so she does not succumb to illness before a big party at the weekend. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe gets Ryder into trouble at school when he helps him complete a homework assignment. Meanwhile, Mel sneaks Lennox into a concert she is not old enough to attend. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica and Barry buy a shabby second-hand van to get back at Murray, while Adam objects when he is voted `nicest guy' in the school yearbook and ends up being suspended.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Inspired by the film Ferris Bueller's Day Off, Barry pretends to be ill so that he can avoid school and create an epic day of his own. However, his plans go awry when Adam has exactly the same idea. Charlie Sheen guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Dana and Adam are given a doll to parent for a class assignment, but find their project compromised when Beverly interferes. Erica tries to get her own back on Barry when he takes up all her best friend Lainey's time.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray takes Adam to a Phillies baseball game and allows him to leave his seat on his own for the first time, only to find Adam immediately gets lost in the stadium. Beverly accompanies Erica and Barry on a shopping trip - but they begin arguing on the way home.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica decides to put college on hold and pursue her dream of becoming a pop singer - which causes her parents no end of stress. Meanwhile, an April Fools' Day prank leads to an all-out war between Adam and Barry. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey, Jeff Garlin and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine. Edited for language.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon misses an opportunity to meet Spider-Man co-creator Stan Lee when he has to go to court for driving through a red light, and his anger leads to his imprisonment. Penny finds out the address of the comic-book writer and takes Sheldon there - but his troubles with the law have yet to reach their conclusion and the visit does not go as expected.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is bothered by the attention he receives in the wake of his heavy element discovery, but is taken aback when his work is disproved by Leonard. Meanwhile, Raj makes Howard and Bernadette feel inadequate when he stays with them for a week and is the perfect house guest.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon leaves for Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he is away, the rest of the friends decorate for Christmas and reflect on how much he has changed their lives. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of his girlfriend's career decision, Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books, and Howard and Raj provide Amy with some advice. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When the guys are unable to get tickets for the Comic-Con, Leonard, Howard and Raj decide to buy fake passes from a stranger - but they then worry about getting caught with them. Sheldon decides to hold his own comic-book convention and searches for a suitable star guest for the event. Meanwhile, the girls take tea at a hotel but discover that maturity is over-rated. Comedy, guest starring James Earl Jones and Carrie Fisher.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy take a train ride to the Napa Valley with Howard and Bernadette on Valentine's Day, while Leonard and Penny head to the vets when they volunteer to look after Raj's dog. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy host a Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, while Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette discover a surprise in their hot tub, and Raj is torn between Emily and a girl he met at the Comic Bookstore. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Bryan Mills and his ex-wife Lenore are taken hostage in Istanbul by an Albanian gangster, whose son Bryan killed while bringing down a kidnapping ring. He is able to escape with the aid of his daughter, and together they fight to rescue Lenore and wipe out the criminal family. Action thriller sequel, starring Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace and Famke Janssen.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics share their opinions on what they watched in December 2015, including The X Factor, Luther, First Dates, The World's Most Expensive Christmas, How the Monarchy Can Make You Millions, Love Actually and the News.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: An edition from October, 2013, gives Britain's most opinionated and avid viewers a chance to comment on the week's TV programmes, including Celebrity Wedding Planner, Dogs: Their Secret Lives, Made in Chelsea, Stephen Fry: Out There and Mastermind, as well as breaking news stories. Narrated by actor and surfing enthusiast Chris Hemsworth, with insight from fellow surfers including Joel Parkinson(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Series exploring Earth's natural history and the factors that have affected it. The programme also examines mankind's dependence on the elements, and how animals' lives are governed by the seasons, as a polar bear prepares its cubs for a long journey to avoid becoming stranded on floating glaciers. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mightiest rivers in the world, from the deep waters of Siberia's Lake Baikal, home to the world's only freshwater seal, to the wetlands downstream of Earth's tallest waterfall patrolled by frenzied piranhas. There is also footage of the lightning-quick ambush of wildebeest by crocodiles in Africa and macaque monkeys swimming underwater to catch crabs in Indonesia. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the world's caves, including the Lechuguilla Cave in America, which contains chambers filled with 6m-long crystals. He observes creatures in Texas and Thailand that never see daylight, and inside Deer Cave in Borneo he finds five million bats whose droppings support an entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The nature series looks at the animals that live on some of the world's highest mountains. Cameras show gelada baboons screaming to frighten off predators in Ethiopia, demoiselle cranes struggling to migrate over the Himalayas, snow leopards hunting on the peaks of Pakistan and a wild giant panda nursing a baby in a hillside cave. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough concludes the documentary series by focusing on the world's deserts. Cameras explore the dry Atacama of Chile, where guanacos survive by licking dew off cacti, and capture the rare sight of wild camels eating snow to stay hydrated on Mongolia's Gobi plains. In the rocky Namibian desert, elephants desperately search for food and lions wander the wilderness hunting oryx.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Camera crews follow the activities of wildlife in the Arctic and Antarctic, including an emperor penguin colony's nine-month migration across sea ice to its breeding ground. The team also takes aerial and underwater shots to capture humpback whales feeding and tracks a male polar bear as it swims 100km to find new ice from which to hunt seals.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The wildlife on the great plains of Africa, Asia, North America and the Arctic, which cover a quarter of the land on Earth. The distinctive Tibetan fox is captured on film for the first time, while a herd of caribou migrates 2,000 miles across the tundra in search of grass. Night vision equipment tracks a pride of 30 lions hunting elephants in the tropical African savannah near one of the region's few remaining waterholes. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: An insight into woodlands around the world, from the stunted conifers cloaked in snow and ice in the Arctic forests, to the broadleaf woods in North America and Europe. Also featured are the 100m-high giant redwoods of California, as well as Madagascar's unusual upside-down trees, which store water in their swollen trunks and harbour strange wildlife. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Ngogo forest in Uganda, to study the largest chimpanzee group in the world defending their territory. The parasitic fungi cordyceps and creatures including the flying colugo, red crab spiders and blue birds of paradise are also observed by the naturalist in jungles around the world.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Following the epic journey of a humpback whale and its calf as they travel from a tropical paradise to the species' great feeding ground in the icy polar seas. David Attenborough also observes footage of colonies of seabirds in the Arabian desert and surfing dolphins in Australia that swim onto the beach to catch their fish.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: An exploration of the survival techniques used by creatures inhabiting the deep oceans of the world, where adaptation is paramount for those dwelling on the surface as well as below. Pods of dolphins are filmed charging in search of prey, surprising methods for conserving energy are revealed as deep-sea octopuses `fly' with wings, and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colourful display.(n)

programme.title: Outback Rangers
programme.desc: The rangers collect eggs for use in crocodile farms. Following the lives of armed rangers at Kakadu National Park in the Northern Territory, Australia.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough presents an exploration of Earth's vast seas, which cover 70 per cent of the planet's surface. In the first episode, millions of squid appear off the coast of California, gannets, whale sharks and dolphins hunt migrating sardines in the Indian Ocean, and thousands of turtles make the annual pilgrimage to lay their eggs in Costa Rica.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Camera crews journey to the deepest parts of the world's oceans to explore the lives of their inhabitants, including fearsome predators with huge teeth, strange jellyfish and deep-sea sharks that lurk among the gigantic submerged mountains and volcanos. Presented by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Predators and prey in the open oceans come under the scrutiny of David Attenborough. Marlin track down a shoal of sardines as a sei whale scoops up the leftovers, dolphins herd mackerel and attract the attention of a sailfish with the resonance of their sonar, and giant sunfish queue up to allow other species, including seagulls, to feed on their parasites.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Marine life at the poles, where winter temperatures frequently fall to a numbing -40C. Even when the sun reappears in the spring, its weak rays take a long time to melt the ice. David Attenborough describes how wildlife including seals, whales, polar bears and penguins overcome the elements to survive through prolonged cold spells.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: An exploration of the world's most densely inhabited waters, where variations in temperature owing to the year-long cycle of the sun encourage a vast array of marine life, from seals and sharks in the winter, to lobster and salmon in the summer, dolphins in the autumn and the walking handfish in spring. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Veteran naturalist David Attenborough explores the fragile marine ecosystem of the coral reef, where all creatures, including the corals themselves, have to fight for survival. From tiny beginnings, the reef grows and develops over hundreds of years, providing support for innumerable animals - yet one storm can threaten the entire community.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the opportunities tides create for marine life, showing giant stingrays gliding on currents for a rest, South African sea snails surfing the waves in pursuit of a meal, crabs playing football on a beach, and bottlenose dolphins embarking on a dangerous game of catch. In the oceanic world each turn of the tide can mean life or death for its inhabitants.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Exploring the wealth of marine life that inhabits the ocean's edge, dealing with the dangers of an ever-shifting environment. David Attenborough observes nesting seabirds in east Russia, Patagonian killer whales, Newfoundland caplin fish, walruses, and Brazilian green turtles - which make their annual expedition to an island in the middle of the Atlantic to lay their eggs.(n)

programme.desc: FBI agent Sean agrees to have the face of terrorist Castor grafted on so that he can foil a bomb plot. But when Castor wakes up from his coma, he forces doctors to graft Sean's face onto his, sparking a deadly game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a washed-up baseball player who, on the morning of the final game of the season, finds out that his girlfriend is leaving to live in London and his team's new owners plan to trade him. As he pitches for the last time, he is torn - in a series of flashbacks - between the game he adores and the woman he loves(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door. A young couple has just moved into their California dream home when they become the target of their next-door neighbour, who disapproves of their relationship. A stern, single father, this tightly wound LAPD officer has appointed himself the watchdog of the neighbourhood. His nightly foot patrols and overly watchful eyes bring comfort to some, but he becomes increasingly aggressive to the newlyweds. These persistent intrusions into their lives cause the couple to fight back(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a little girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco in this Pixar adventure from director Pete Docter (Up, Monsters Inc.). Young Riley was perfectly content with her life when her father landed a new job in San Francisco, and the family moved across the country. Now, as Riley prepares to navigate a new city and attend a new school, her emotional headquarters becomes a hot bed of activity. As Joy (voice of Amy Poehler) attempts to keep Riley feeling happy and positive about the move, other emotions like Fear (voice of Bill Hader), Anger (voice of Lewis Black), Disgust (voice of Mindy Kaling) and Sadness (Phyllis Smith) make the transition a bit more complicated(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: A haunting tale of a widow with psychic powers who gets involved in a murder mystery(n)

programme.desc: In Love With the King. Historical drama about three women manoeuvring to become queen of England begins in 1463, as a secret wedding between a commoner and a royal leads to some regal intrigue(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Price of Power. After Elizabeth's coronation, Edward desires a son to solidify his reign, but court tensions escalate into war and he's forced to fight those closest to him to keep his crown. Meanwhile, Elizabeth deals with the full force of Warwick's hatred(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Storm. To further her son's claim to the throne, Margaret Beaufort joins Warwick's rebellion against Edward, but when the insurrection is thwarted, the traitors flee for their lives, with Jasper Tudor going into exile, while Warwick and George sail to France(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Bad Queen. Lord Warwick's power grab turns desperate as old enemies form new alliances(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: War at First Hand. After witnessing the brutality of the battlefield Queen Elizabeth, Anne Neville and Margaret Beaufort see their relationships turn even more bitter(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Love and Death. The crown is secure, but there is no peace at court. Elizabeth suffers more emotional turmoil as she loses those closest to her. Margaret Beaufort plans a political marriage to bring Henry home from exile - but has she met her match in Lord Stanley? Anne's marriage made her a traitor, so she is handed into George's care. His motives for keeping her away from court are questioned by Richard, who fears for Anne's safety(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Poison and Malmsey Wine. George's anger at losing the Warwick inheritance and his failure to capture the crown resurfaces, with horrific consequences. As the court divides, George openly accuses Elizabeth of witchcraft and Edward of murder. This is treason, and Edward must condemn his own brother to death. Elizabeth finally has revenge on those who killed her father, but it does not bring her comfort(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Long Live the King. King Edward deals with key players scheming and maneuvering to mount the thrown(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Princess in the Tower. The future of the princes in the Tower is in Richard's hands: they are a threat to his reign but also to Margaret's hopes of seeing her son Henry Tudor on the throne. As Margaret plots the boys' removal, Anne is tormented by fears she has unwittingly sealed the princes' fate. Elizabeth, in sanctuary, is horrified to realise she has made a pact with her enemies and turns to witchcraft to punish the guilty(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael and the team are sent on a secret mission to San Miguelito, Panama, to apprehend Tyler Gray, the man who murdered Nate. Shortly after arriving, they are ambushed by a group of mercenaries under the command of the hitman - who has anticipated their arrival. The members of the team are forced to abandon the safe house, leaving them stranded without time to call for backup - or the instruments they will need to finish the job.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Flynn and Provenza attend the funeral of a former police colleague, but events take a surprising turn when the contents of the coffin are revealed. Meanwhile, Brenda and Fritz's house-hunting gains momentum. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team face a race against time to find a missing eight-year-old girl who disappeared on her way home from school, and Gabriel puts his career in jeopardy when he takes drastic action to solve the case.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A psychiatrist is found murdered, leading Goren and Eames to suspect an ophthalmologist may be involved, especially when they realise that his research into schizophrenia could be masking mental health problems of his own. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the seemingly random murders of several homeless people, uncovering a fraud involving a crooked insurance agent. But when he is found dead, with no sign of the stolen money, the detectives must call on all their experience to catch the killer. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan, with Lance Reddick (The Wire).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives find themselves in the middle of a dramatic case when a man claims to have murdered seven people, but refuses to identify himself. Meanwhile, Brenda goes house-hunting with Fritz. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a personal trainer who was killed in the car park of a restaurant, but the only witness is a frightened valet with OCD. Meanwhile, the department has to complete anti-terrorism training to receive funding from the government. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead in her apartment, her son, recently paroled after serving 15 years for murder, becomes the prime suspect. Goren and Eames meet the detective who investigated the earlier case and discover the man may have been wrongly convicted - revealing a complex cover-up that implicates the policeman himself. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate when a man's release from prison coincides with the murder of his wife and lawyer. His claims to have been the killer's real target are given a credibility boost when Goren learns that a notorious criminal might have received a hit-list that featured his son. Crime drama, with Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers faulty bulletproof vests in an abandoned truck filled with stolen USMC merchandise, and attempts to locate the source of the cargo and any vests that could have been sent to military personnel overseas. Crime drama, guest starring Challen Cates, with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby's homeland security think-tank is compromised when its leader is found to have been murdered, and a theoretical guide to how to pull off a terror attack is stolen.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins become millionaires after Peter blows his life savings on lottery tickets, but things take a turn for the worse as they struggle to cope with their new-found wealth. Comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan grows fed up with Hayley and Jeff's lazy behaviour, so he bets them he and Francine can live on the minimum wage for a month. Steve and Roger undertake a mission to test-drive their dream car.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Kidney Stays in the Picture.
programme.desc: Stan discovers that Francine was unfaithful to him before they got married, leaving him worried that Hayley might not be his biological daughter. He travels back in time to learn the identity of her father, but when he inadvertently disrupts past events, he must do everything in his power to avoid changing the future.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is rude to an old man in a wheelchair, who retaliates by casting a spell that makes him age rapidly. Vowing to redeem himself, the CIA agent determines to climb Kilimanjaro to reverse the curse put on him. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is horrified when Steve's friend Barry comes close to beating his high-school wrestling record, and enlists Roger's help to defeat him. However, his plan proves to be badly flawed when Roger threatens to claim the record instead.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Greg and Terry adopt a child, but after seeing their comfortable way of life Roger gets rid of their new son and takes his place instead. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger's one-night stand with a fellow alien he and Francine find in the woods develops into a full-blown relationship. However, he soon gets tired of his new girlfriend's quirks - and tries to get rid of her by calling the CIA. With the voice of Kim Kardashian.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Mayor West marries Lois's sister and the pair move into the Griffin family home, where he becomes Peter's best friend. However, not everyone welcomes the new arrivals, and Stewie takes over Chris's room after being evicted from his own.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Bertram goes back in time to kill Leonardo da Vinci - forcing Stewie and Brian to give chase. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein, with Wallace Shawn (Toy Story).(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger acts as the Smith family therapist under the guise of his alter ego Dr Penguin, but his services are cut short when he is sent to fight in the Iraq War - leaving Klaus with the opportunity to take over his counselling duties.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine ignores her husband's objections and buys Steve the dog he has always wanted. However, when a horrific accident leaves the canine in critical condition, a traumatic memory from his childhood leaves Stan unable to turn off life support.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigate when a mysterious, fast-spreading illness strikes children from military families. While Gibbs investigates the cause, Abby and Jimmy partner with the Naval Medical Research Centre in the hope of delivering a cure before the holidays. Mark Harmon stars.(n)
