programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.(n)

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.(n)

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion Interview Special
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Olga Kurylenko and director Joseph Kosinski discuss making the sci-fi movie.(n)

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours
programme.desc: A couple living in suburbia and adjusting to new parenthood are determined to prove they can still be cool when a household of students moves in next door. However, when their raucous neighbours' wild parties disrupt their lives, they decide to fight back, leading to a vicious cycle of one-upmanship. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor secures himself a new home in a luxurious apartment complex, where residents are able to shut out the rest of the world. As society begins to break down in the face of failing infrastructure, tension erupts between residents of different floors, leading to a literal class war. Ben Wheatley's satirical thriller based on JG Ballard's novel, starring Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Irons, Sienna Miller and Luke Evans.(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity forces an ageing hippie to divide his time between trying to win a bowling tournament and searching for a wealthy industrialist's kidnapped wife, while getting involved with assorted oddball characters in the process. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi, David Huddleston, Philip Seymour Hoffman and John Turturro.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: A boy starts a new school determined to be popular and admired, only to find himself instead a target for bullies. He documents his experiences in a journal as he sets out on a series of attempts to gain the respect he feels he deserves - but his every effort ends in disaster. Family comedy, with Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class Special
programme.desc: Director Matthew Vaughn and his cast discuss the making of the superhero prequel.(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy.(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class Special
programme.desc: Director Matthew Vaughn and his cast discuss the making of the superhero prequel.(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Premiere. Tourists on a coach tour of the Netherlands find themselves stranded when their vehicle breaks down in the remote countryside beside an old windmill that appears neither on their itinerary nor any maps. With no mechanic willing to venture out until the next day, they have to stay overnight and begin to be picked off and dispatched with gruesome violence, realising that their dark secrets have resurrected a local blood-soaked medieval legend. Horror, starring Charlotte Beaumont and Noah Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Hasta que la boda nos separe
Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels around Europe and north Africa to experience local cultures through their cuisine, beginning in Marrakech, where he tries street food, visits a communal bread oven, makes a nomad stew and joins a family for lunch to sample Moroccan home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver seeks the authentic tastes of Spain in Andalucia. He makes paella for the whole town of Ronda, birthplace of modern bullfighting, and is taught how to cut serrano ham by an award-winning father and son team. As he joins in the local festivities, including carrying a giant statue of the Virgin Mary from church to church, he takes time to cook tomato salad with chorizo, pork chops with Spanish beans, and quail's egg with black pudding.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Swedish capital, where he tries reindeer heart at an old indoor market and catches a boat to pick wild mushrooms and blueberries on one of the city's surrounding islands. He also tries fermented herring, heads to the royal palace to check the guards' menu, and prepares gravadlax, blueberry buns, creamy mushrooms, pike perch and roasted beetroot salad.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver steers away from the tourist trails in Venice as he explores the gastronomy of the Italian city. He prepares spaghetti vongole for a group of local fishermen, is taught the art of the perfect risotto by Ruggero Bovo, samples prosecco and cooks a bellini with beef carpaccio. The chef also tries his hand at minestrone with vegetables before being joined by old friend Gennaro Contaldo to make a Venetian tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the villages surrounding Toulouse in the French Pyrenees, an area renowned for its artisan food. He goes truffle-hunting and prepares an omelette with the pickings, learns how to make bread in the traditional way, and joins locals for a wild boar hunt. The chef also shows how to prepare tarte Tatin, Roquefort salad, confit of duck and a country-style terrine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Greek capital, where he heads to the street markets for his take on the local fast food - souvlaki and kebabs. programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver steers away from the tourist trails in Venice as he explores the gastronomy of the Italian city. He prepares spaghetti vongole for a group of local fishermen, is taught the art of the perfect risotto by Ruggero Bovo, samples prosecco and cooks a bellini with beef carpaccio. The chef also tries his hand at minestrone with vegetables before being joined by old friend Gennaro Contaldo to make a Venetian tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the villages surrounding Toulouse in the French Pyrenees, an area renowned for its artisan food. He goes truffle-hunting and prepares an omelette with the pickings, learns how to make bread in the traditional way, and joins locals for a wild boar hunt. The chef also shows how to prepare tarte Tatin, Roquefort salad, confit of duck and a country-style terrine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Greek capital, where he heads to the street markets for his take on the local fast food - souvlaki and kebabs. The chef then learns how honey is made, teams up with a cheese-making priest and milks a goat, and prepares a selection of recipes including fisherman's stew, Greek salad, pistachio and honey cake, and a tuna dish.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels around Europe and north Africa to experience local cultures through their cuisine, beginning in Marrakech, where he tries street food, visits a communal bread oven, makes a nomad stew and joins a family for lunch to sample Moroccan home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver seeks the authentic tastes of Spain in Andalucia. He makes paella for the whole town of Ronda, birthplace of modern bullfighting, and is taught how to cut serrano ham by an award-winning father and son team. As he joins in the local festivities, including carrying a giant statue of the Virgin Mary from church to church, he takes time to cook tomato salad with chorizo, pork chops with Spanish beans, and quail's egg with black pudding.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Swedish capital, where he tries reindeer heart at an old indoor market and catches a boat to pick wild mushrooms and blueberries on one of the city's surrounding islands. He also tries fermented herring, heads to the royal palace to check the guards' menu, and prepares gravadlax, blueberry buns, creamy mushrooms, pike perch and roasted beetroot salad.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.desc: Adam Richman tries to eat a seven-course meal in 90 minutes when he visits Alaska.(n)

programme.desc: Adam Richman travels across the sea to Honolulu in Hawaii, where he faces a giant pancake challenge.(n)

programme.desc: Adam Richman takes on the Hellfire Challenge in Salt Lake City, in which he must consume a platter of extremely spicy sushi rolls and three other fiery dishes.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Foggy ropes Compo and Clegg into reconstructing a battle when a pit at a building site brings back memories of his wartime exploits. Comedy, starring Brain Wilde and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Beth and Tyler announce they have become vegetarians and set off to Ludlow races to protest about the treatment of animals. Meanwhile, Jed's scarecrow in the barn is mistaken for a human body, and Marlene enrols on a mail-order reiki healing course as part of a plan to create a massage parlour and beauty salon at the farm.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Adventures of Professor Branestawm
programme.desc: Harry Hill takes the title role of the absent-minded inventor, who is oblivious to the chaos caused by his ridiculous creations when they go wrong - which is more often than not. Luckily, his long-suffering housekeeper Miss Flittersnoop and dim-but-loyal best friend Colonel Dedshott are on hand to make sure he doesn't blow himself to smithereens. However, the trio meet their match when a local councillor tries to run the professor out of the village for being a dangerous nuisance, so Miss Flittersnoop's science-mad niece Connie comes to their aid. Comedy drama, co-starring Vicki Pepperdine, Simon Day and Madeline Holliday, with David Mitchell, Miranda Richardson and Ben Miller. Written by Charlie Higson from the popular children's books by Norman Hunter.(n)

programme.title: Harry Hill in Professor Branestawm Returns
programme.desc: Harry Hill is back as the absent-minded professor with the multiple spectacles, who believes his money troubles are over when Lady Pagwell dies, leaving a substantial sum to fund local inventing. However, scheming local councillor Harold Haggerstone insists on holding a competition to decide who gets the money - and that's when a rival turns up - the self-proclaimed greatest inventor in the world Professor Algebrain. To make matters worse, Branestawm has been neglecting his young assistant Connie - and now she is working with his rival. Comedy drama, co-starring Steve Pemberton, David Mitchell, Vicki Pepperdine, Simon Day and Madeline Holliday.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Dress
programme.desc: Family comedy adapted from David Walliams' children's book about 12-year-old Dennis, an ordinary boy who lives in an ordinary town - but somehow feels different from everyone else. A chance sighting in a fashion magazine introduces him to a whole new world of colour and creativity. But can a boy really wear a dress - and what will his headmaster, dad and friends in the football team think if they find out? Billy Kennedy stars as Dennis, with a supporting cast including Jennifer Saunders, Tim McInnerny, Meera Syal, Steve Speirs, Felicity Montagu, James Buckley and Walliams himself, with a cameo appearance by supermodel Kate Moss.(n)

programme.title: Billionaire Boy
programme.desc: Family comedy, by David Walliams and Kevin Cecil. Len Spud and his 12-year-old son Joe become billionaires when Len invents a new toilet roll. Len soon starts dating fortysomething hand model Sapphire Diamond, while the butler helps a neglected and unhappy Joe transfer to the local comprehensive where he conceals the facts of his wealth. However, when Len turns up at the school with his son's forgotten homework, the cat is soon out of the bag. John Thomson stars as the inventor, alongside Walliams, Catherine Tate and Rebecca Front, and featuring Warwick Davis and Bryn Terfel as themselves.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Grand Day Out
programme.desc: Nick Park's Bafta-winning film which introduced the animated inventor and his faithful canine sidekick to the world. Wallace is distraught when his cheese supplies run out, so he decides to take a trip to the moon. All he needs to do is build himself a rocket. With the voice of Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: The Wrong Trousers
programme.desc: Nick Park's Oscar-winning animation featuring the bumbling inventor and his faithful dog, whose lives are turned upside down after foolishly offering board and lodgings to villainous penguin Feathers McGraw. With the voice of Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Close Shave
programme.desc: Nick Park's Oscar-winning animated characters embark on their third adventure. Wallace falls in love with the proprietor of the local wool shop - only for Gromit to be framed for sheep rustling. With the voices of Peter Sallis and Anne Reid.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
programme.desc: The duo open their own bakery, Top Bun, and business is soon booming - not least because a `cereal killer' is targeting all the rival bakers in town. Even better, Wallace has caught the eye of local beauty Piella Bakewell. But Gromit is more concerned that his master might become the killer's next victim. With the voices of Peter Sallis and Sally Lindsay.(n)

programme.title: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
programme.desc: Daffy Duck tires of playing second fiddle to Bugs Bunny, so sets off to seek his fortune. He ends up helping a would-be stuntman rescue his screen idol father, in reality a secret agent, who has been kidnapped by the deranged chairman of the Acme Corporation. Live action and animated comedy, with Brendan Fraser, Steve Martin, Timothy Dalton and Jenna Elfman.(n)

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham.(n)

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The eccentric pet detective is coaxed out of self-imposed exile in a Buddhist monastery to visit Africa and help search for a sacred white bat. However, his unique investigative talents are tested to the limits as he faces a race against time to find the missing creature and prevent a tribal war. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey, Simon Callow and Bob Gunton.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Vince MCs at the Velvet Onion, where the Black Tubes are headlining. Keen to fill the shoes of their recently deceased frontman, he tries to squeeze into the band's customary drainpipe jeans. Meanwhile, Howard takes acting lessons from Montgomery Flange in a bid to overcome his stage fright. Guest starring the Horrors.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Reluctant to celebrate his birthday, Howard eventually succumbs to Vince's plan for a huge party. With Bollo on the door, Saboo and Harrison on the decks and Vince's trendy friends on the dance floor, the party goes with a swing - until someone is caught in a compromising position with the Head Shaman's wife.(n)

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: The return of the anthology of darkly comic tales in which each episode explores the goings-on behind a door marked No 9. On board the overnight service from Paris to Bourg St Maurice, a motley collection of passengers tries to get a quiet night's sleep as the train makes its way across France. But as the sleeping compartment fills up, the chances of that begin to look highly unlikely. Written by and starring Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith, with Julie Hesmondhalgh, Mark Benton and Jack Whitehall.(n)

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: Christine Clarke brings a man back to her flat from a New Year's Eve party and her life immediately starts to unravel. Who is the terrifying stranger who keeps appearing in the apartment at night? Darkly comic tale by Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith, starring Sheridan Smith, Tom Riley and Michele Dotrice.(n)

programme.title: Nathan Barley
programme.desc: Sugar Ape magazine editor Jonatton decides Dan should sample gay sex - the type that only involves straight men. Meanwhile, Nathan becomes smitten with a drug-addicted model whose dubious grasp on reality proves irresistible. Comedy, starring Nick Burns.(n)

programme.title: The Armando Iannucci Shows
programme.desc: Armando tackles the subject of communication through sketches involving a middle-aged couple in a restaurant who don't speak to each other, and a man doing DIY who accidentally nails himself to a cabinet but is too embarrassed to tell his wife.(n)

programme.title: Human Remains
programme.desc: Spoof documentary about a couple of religious zealots and Scottish country dancing enthusiasts who are convinced the neighbours practise black magic. Written by and starring Rob Brydon and Julia Davis.(n)

programme.title: Human Remains
programme.desc: Rob Brydon and Julia Davis star in the darkly comic spoof documentary series in which neurotic Barne and wannabe rock chic Fonte invite TV cameras into their home.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Beth and Tyler announce they have become vegetarians and set off to Ludlow races to protest about the treatment of animals. Meanwhile, Jed's scarecrow in the barn is mistaken for a human body, and Marlene enrols on a mail-order reiki healing course as part of a plan to create a massage parlour and beauty salon at the farm.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin's cricket team is a man short and he knows Paul is a very good player - as do the rest of the side and they all want him in, even if it means they can't play themselves. Can he bring himself to pick his arch-enemy? Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Paul Egan.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Barker and Corbett present more classic comedy sketches, with a song from Tina Charles and another episode in the gripping period drama Hampton Wick.(n)

programme.title: The Two Ronnies
programme.desc: Vintage sketches from Messrs Barker and Corbett, including Fancy Dress Party, Smart Cooking with Lionel Smart, and classic serial Hampton Wick. With music from Tina Charles.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Grand Day Out
programme.desc: Nick Park's Bafta-winning film which introduced the animated inventor and his faithful canine sidekick to the world. Wallace is distraught when his cheese supplies run out, so he decides to take a trip to the moon. All he needs to do is build himself a rocket. With the voice of Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: The Wrong Trousers
programme.desc: Nick Park's Oscar-winning animation featuring the bumbling inventor and his faithful dog, whose lives are turned upside down after foolishly offering board and lodgings to villainous penguin Feathers McGraw. With the voice of Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Close Shave
programme.desc: Nick Park's Oscar-winning animated characters embark on their third adventure. Wallace falls in love with the proprietor of the local wool shop - only for Gromit to be framed for sheep rustling. With the voices of Peter Sallis and Anne Reid.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
programme.desc: The duo open their own bakery, Top Bun, and business is soon booming - not least because a `cereal killer' is targeting all the rival bakers in town. Even better, Wallace has caught the eye of local beauty Piella Bakewell. But Gromit is more concerned that his master might become the killer's next victim. With the voices of Peter Sallis and Sally Lindsay.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del feels down on his luck after the council rejects his application for a home improvement grant, but his spirits are raised when he hears about a fancy-dress party across town. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield star as the wheeler-dealers in the first part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy. With Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong, Douglas Hodge and Angela Bruce.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del buys a new manual to help him show Raquel more appreciation and give him the confidence to make positive decisions. Unfortunately, as a result of such upbeat thinking, the Trotters' cash flow hits an all-time low and an angry punter is left baying for blood. The second part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason, Tessa Peake-Jones and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Raquel invites her estranged parents around for dinner, and Del-Boy is keen to make an impression - but a mix-up with the gravy boat puts a damper on proceedings. However, things soon take a turn for the better when Del's `father-in-law' finds an old watch among the Trotters' junk, which he claims could net them a pretty packet at auction. But nothing can quite prepare them for the shock they have in store. The final part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: If They Could See Us Now.
programme.desc: Five years after finally achieving their lifelong dream of becoming millionaires, the Trotter brothers jet off to Monte Carlo with their wives and little Damien - but another dodgy deal by Del sees them scarpering back home and straight to the bankruptcy court. As the despondent duo come to terms with losing their fortune, they receive shocking news about Uncle Albert. Christmas special from 2001.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the company's managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Christmas special from 2003. As Rodney and Cassandra prepare for the arrival of their own little plonker, the Trotter brothers must raise the money they need to pay back the Inland Revenue or risk losing their cherished flat in Nelson Mandela House - but an old photo soon takes the plot into much darker territory. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong and John Challis star in the last-ever episode.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, with Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen.(n)

programme.title: Eddie Izzard: Force Majeure
programme.desc: A stand-up performance from the comedian, offering a glimpse into the mind of the master surrealist. The show was recorded during Izzard's mammoth 2013-14 tour, which saw him visit 27 countries across the world.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: The chef gives his views on why the British are unadventurous when cooking seafood and demonstrates ideas for preparing monkfish, hake and squid.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Keith Floyd dredges for scallops in Dorset before heading to the George Hotel in Bridport to cook them. He also rustles up a bass dish with Rick Stein at the chef's seafood restaurant in Padstow.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Keith Floyd visits St Malo's large fish market in Brittany, France, before going to a restaurant owned by Jacques Yves Cadiou. He also visits an oyster farm at Cancale, and prepares his favourite dish, bourride, at the Chalut eaterie.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: The chef buys the ingredients for bouillabaisse and visits the Duchy of Cornwall's oyster farm on the Helford River, before preparing mussels in their kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Keith Floyd visits Somerset and Essex, where he tries angling for pike and salmon with the help of two fisherman, and cooks salmon at the Carved Angel in Dartmouth.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: The chef visits a trout farm and samples the delights of Japanese cooking.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Fish
programme.desc: Chef Keith Floyd demonstrates how to cook paella, before preparing crab and fishing for cockles in Weymouth. He also rustles up a fish soup during a trawler race in Plymouth.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Britain and Ireland
programme.desc: The chef samples the food of Northumberland, and cooks a pork, vegetable, wine and herb stew after being inspired by the sight of Hadrian's Wall. Plus, he takes a trip on a trawler boat and prepares a panache of fish.(n)

programme.title: Floyd on Britain and Ireland
programme.desc: Keith Floyd samples the traditional fare of Ulster, cooking beef in Guinness stout with oysters, and paying a visit to the Old Bushmills Distillery. He also takes part in the Taste of Ulster culinary contest, where he faces stiff competition in the form of Northern Ireland's best chefs, and learns the art of making potato bread at the Ulster Folk Museum.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Fact-based seafaring drama in which the crew of a commercial fishing boat become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing-boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions. When the ice machine breaks down, his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100-foot waves(n)

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's part Film4-funded, multi Oscar- and BAFTA-nominated, fact-based drama stars James Franco as a mountain climber who gets himself into a desperate predicament. When adrenaline junkie Aaron Ralston (Franco) sets off to conquer a canyon in the stunning landscape of a Utah national park, he has no idea quite how bad a day he's in for. His trip starts out well enough, bumping into Kristi (Kate Mara) and Megan (Amber Tamblyn), a couple of foxy female hikers, but it starts its inexorable decline when he heads off to tackle Blue John Canyon - solo, with no means of communication on him and without telling anyone his plans. So, when he quickly and irreversibly gets his arm stuck under a rock, he's utterly on his own. All he's carrying is a miniscule supply of food and water and - crucially - a small multi-tool. During the 127 hours he's pinned to the canyon wall, Ralston weighs his options, mentally replays the key points of his life and loves, drifts into delirium, and, finally, summons the sheer grit and force of will needed to commit the act that could give him a slim chance of survival. And the squeamish may need to look away and plug their ears when he does so!(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled private eye investigates a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Meanwhile, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Docudrama about two young arms dealers who win a $300 million contract to supply weaponry to US forces in Afghanistan(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb(n)

programme.title: Mariela Castro's March: Cuba's LGBT Revolution
programme.desc: A profile of Mariela Castro, a daughter of Cuban president Raúl Castro and a member of the National Assembly who is an influential advocate for the nation's LGBT community(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: Bastian, a lonely schoolboy alienated from his father and bullied by his classmates, retreats to an attic where he becomes engrossed in a book entitled THE NEVERENDING STORY. It is the tale of a magical kingdom named Fantasia, since it is a world born of human fantasies. However, as humanity loses faith in the power of imagination, the once-thriving Fantasia is being destroyed by great storms of Nothingness(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: When astronaut Leo Davidson drives through an electromagnetic storm on a space pod in search of his chimpanzee friend Pericles he accidentally crashes on a planet ruled by ape-like beings. Will he find Pericles? Will he be able to leave the strange planet?(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites in this outrageous action comedy(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Fate of the Furious'
programme.desc: A look at "The Fate of the Furious," a 2017 thriller that finds Dom being lured back into a life of crime by a mysterious woman who turns him against his own family. The film stars Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson, and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)
he true story of Brooklyn Dodgers hitter Jackie Robinson, who in 1946 became the first African-American Major League baseball player. Chadwick Boseman, TR Knight, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie(n)

programme.desc: In this taut thriller, a sociopathic death-row inmate is implanted with a deceased CIA agent's memories in an attempt to thwart a deadly plot. At the same time, he reconnects with his own humanity as he bonds with the late agent's family(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: Jimmy Neutron is a boy genius. When parents all over Earth are kidnapped by aliens, it's up to him to lead all the children of the world to their rescue!(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: The story revolves around Lucy and her siblings. While playing, they find a wardrobe and end up in a magical land called Narnia. The story takes a turn when they realize that they must join forces with Aslan and fight against the wicked queen(n)

programme.title: Marathon: The Patriots Day Bombing
programme.desc: The 2013 Boston Marathon terrorist attacks are recalled in this in-depth documentary through interviews with survivors and their families, as well as first responders, investigators, government officials and reporters from the Boston Globe. The film also uses surveillance video and home movies to recount the tragic events(n)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday is forgotten by her family who are distracted by the upcoming wedding of her older sister, and to compound things, she has a crush on a popular older classmate and is suffering the unwanted attentions of a sophomoric geek(n)

programme.desc: Far from seeing eye to eye, Batman and Superman engage in a battle of the ages which plays straight into the hands into Lex Luthor. programme.desc: A superteam of vicious criminals including The Joker, Harley Quinn and Deadshot are recruited to embark on a suicide mission for the benefit of a government agency(n)

programme.title: J. Cole: 4 Your Eyez Only, A Dreamville Film
programme.desc: A showcase for songs from hip-hop artist J. Cole's fourth studio album, "4 Your Eyez Only," features music performances and stories of hardship from residents in Baton Rouge, Atlanta, Ferguson, Mo., Fayetteville, N.C., and Jonesboro, Ark(n)

programme.title: Crashing
programme.desc: The Baptism. In the Season 1 finale, Artie Lange tags along with Pete to a baptism after an attempt to cheer him up goes awry, and they both come away with new perspectives on spirituality and sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Fate of the Furious'
programme.desc: A look at "The Fate of the Furious," a 2017 thriller that finds Dom being lured back into a life of crime by a mysterious woman who turns him against his own family. The film stars Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson, and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: A tribute to "Girls," which wraps its sixth and final season on April 16, 2017(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after an incident at a fashionable event causes them to be hounded by the paparazzi(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Docudrama about two young arms dealers who win a $300 million contract to supply weaponry to US forces in Afghanistan(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb(n)

programme.title: Mariela Castro's March: Cuba's LGBT Revolution
programme.desc: A profile of Mariela Castro, a daughter of Cuban president Raúl Castro and a member of the National Assembly who is an influential advocate for the nation's LGBT community(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: Bastian, a lonely schoolboy alienated from his father and bullied by his classmates, retreats to an attic where he becomes engrossed in a book entitled THE NEVERENDING STORY. It is the tale of a magical kingdom named Fantasia, since it is a world born of human fantasies. However, as humanity loses faith in the power of imagination, the once-thriving Fantasia is being destroyed by great storms of Nothingness(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: When astronaut Leo Davidson drives through an electromagnetic storm on a space pod in search of his chimpanzee friend Pericles he accidentally crashes on a planet ruled by ape-like beings. Will he find Pericles? Will he be able to leave the strange planet?(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites in this outrageous action comedy(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Fate of the Furious'
programme.desc: A look at "The Fate of the Furious," a 2017 thriller that finds Dom being lured back into a life of crime by a mysterious woman who turns him against his own family. The film stars Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson, and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)
he true story of Brooklyn Dodgers hitter Jackie Robinson, who in 1946 became the first African-American Major League baseball player. Chadwick Boseman, TR Knight, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie(n)

programme.desc: In this taut thriller, a sociopathic death-row inmate is implanted with a deceased CIA agent's memories in an attempt to thwart a deadly plot. At the same time, he reconnects with his own humanity as he bonds with the late agent's family(n)

programme.desc: 03/21/2017 12:00:00 AM. Segments include a report on former Maryland Terps basketball player Juan Dixon; a profile of 2004 top MLB draft pick Matt Bush; and an examination of the "yips," including a chat with former baseball player Rick Ankiel(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Sisters'
programme.desc: A look at "Sisters," a 2015 comedy about two siblings who throw one last party at their childhood home before their parents sell it. The film stars Tina Fey, Amy Poehler and Ike Barinholtz, and is directed by Jason Moore(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Successful and single businesswoman Kate Holbrook is finally determined to have a kid on her own now that she is 37. But when she discovers that she has only a million-to-one chance of getting pregnant, the driven Kate finds in working girl Angie Ostrowiski an unlikely surrogate. Everything is apparently going well. That until Angie shows up at Kate doorstep with no place to live. The two opposites try to get along and, in the middle of their tug-of-war, they discover that there can be a different kind of family(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: Thriller starring Joaquin Phoenix, in which the residents of an isolated 19th-century village in Pennsylvania live in fear of mysterious creatures that inhabit the surrounding woodland. Their safety is dependent on not venturing beyond the village boundary, but when a youth decides to seek medical supplies from another community, his adventurism triggers a spate of incidents that instil terror into his fellow villagers(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: Fans of Arnold Schwarzenegger will be delighted as Arnie takes on his biggest fight yet...with the Devil himself! Satan, played by Gabriel Byrne, is in town and he has just one thing on his mind - to impregnate a woman with the Devil's spawn before the turn of the Millennium(n)

programme.title: Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: A chronicle of a 16-week boot camp for incarcerated young people run by the Miami-Dade County Corrections and Rehabilitation Department that aims to make them constructive members of society who are less likely to return to prison. Dwayne Johnson is an executive producer(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: In the rollicking, stunt-filled fourth installment in the popular franchise, gung-ho cop John McClane goes interface to interface with technoterrorists plotting to hack into government computers and bring the country to a standstill(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Goodbye Tour. Hannah has an important meeting and later reaches out to friends for advice, but has trouble reaching Marnie(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after an incident at a fashionable event causes them to be hounded by the paparazzi(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), known only by the barcode tattoo on his neck, is an elite international assassin. Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men. As 47 races to complete his mission, new information emerges about his origins and sparks a race against time as the agent is hunted for the secrets behind his skills. Aleksander Bach directs this reboot of the 2007 action thriller Hitman(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: A talk show about current events(n)

programme.title: Evil Dead 2: Dead by Dawn
programme.desc: Special effects and humour blend in a sequel about teenagers trapped in a haunted cabin(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: A family settles into its vacation home, which happens to be the next stop for a pair of young, articulate, white-gloved serial killers on an excursion through the neighborhood(n)

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: Legendary black Olympian Jesse Owens competes in track and field at the 1936 Games in Nazi Germany, despite the host country's attempts to turn the event into a celebration of national pride and Aryan supremacy(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Axis Mundi. Season 2 opens in a Texas town that was renamed Miracle for having no departures, but longtime resident John Murphy is skeptical of charlatans and carpetbaggers who are trying to profit from this good fortune. Meanwhile, the Murphys welcome new neighbors when Kevin, Nora and Jill relocate from New York, hoping to start a new life(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A Matter of Geography. Nora gets an offer on her house from an unlikely buyer with a morbid curiosity, but the money could come in handy when she and Jill are on board with Kevin's impulsive suggestion to leave Mapleton behind(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Off Ramp. Laurie works on a book to expose the evils of the Guilty Remnant, and rents office space to serve as a refuge for individuals fleeing the cult, while Tom goes undercover in the silent sanctuaries to rescue lost souls from its clutches(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Orange Sticker. An earthquake rocks Miracle in the middle of the night, but Nora has no idea where Kevin is, and when he finally comes home he can't remember where he was or what happened to his phone. Meanwhile, Evie's disappearance has the Murphys reeling; and an old adversary makes her presence felt(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: No Room at the Inn. Matt and Mary leave Miracle to see if they can learn more about her condition, but their lives are turned upside down when they're not allowed back into town and must deal with the mob of desperate squatters that lingers just outside the gates(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Lens. Surprise visitors irk Nora as she becomes preoccupied with self-examination. Meanwhile, Erika finds an unlikely ally; and Kevin's situation is finally plain for all to see(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A Most Powerful Adversary. Nora delivers shocking news to Jill and Kevin, who worries about how to solve his Patti problem. Meanwhile, Laurie makes a startling decision that affects her whole family(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: International Assassin. Kevin hopes to conquer Patti once and for all, in an unusual arena, but any resolution could come at great personal cost(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Ten Thirteen. Meg's path to the Guilty Remnant follows an intense personal loss. Meanwhile, Tom hopes to reunite with Meg after a fallout with his mom(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: I Live Here Now. John is skeptical of Kevin's revelation about the night Evie disappeared. Meanwhile, the fourth anniversary of the Departure brings an unexpected threat to Miracle(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Goodbye Tour. Hannah has an important meeting and later reaches out to friends for advice, but has trouble reaching Marnie(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, the illusionists known as the Four Horsemen (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Lizzy Caplan, and Dave Franco) return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their names and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul named Walter Mabry (Daniel Radcliffe). However, Mabry soon turns the tables, and forces the group to steal a revolutionary decrypting device for him. Directed by Jon M. Chu (G.I. Joe: Retaliation)(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: M Night Shyamalan's widely acclaimed chiller about a boy who has the not-entirely-welcome ability to directly contact the dead. Bruce Willis stars as child psychologist Dr Malcolm Crowe, who is asked to help Cole Sear (Haley Joel Osment), who claims he can 'see dead people'. Crowe is sceptical at first, but - prompted partly by a similar case from his past, who he felt he badly let down - he's gradually convinced that the boy is telling the truth. Crowe believes that actively engaging with the ghostly presences could help both Sear and the spirits to find peace. Overcoming his terror, the lad finds that communicating with the deceased does, at first, seem to be beneficial. But then matters take on their own momentum, leading to one of the director's trademark plot twists..(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: C**tgate. A US financial crisis looms, forcing Selina to make a game-changing decision; Jonah returns to New Hampshire; Amy looks into the staff's personal and professional histories; Catherine struggles to schedule time with her mother to share some big news(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Congressional Ball. The White House Christmas party finds Selina canvassing for votes to break the election tie. Meanwhile, the "50 Hottest D.C. Staffers" list is on everyone's lips in the West Wing; Mike mulls a career move; and Dan helps Jonah hone his debate skills in New Hampshire(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Camp David. A pre-Christmas celebration for Selina's family at Camp David camouflages her team's secret negotiations. Meanwhile, Amy and Dan work on Jonah's human side after a terrible debate performance in New Hampshire(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Kissing Your Sister. Mike prepares for fatherhood; Catherine and Marjorie have a major disagreement; Selina sits for an interview(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Inauguration. Inauguration Day is coming in the Series 5 finale, and Selina and her staff are busy preparing. Meanwhile, Mike's fatigue gets the best of him; and Catherine gets a makeover(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker (Jeff Bridges) gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire (David Huddleston) whose name he shares. Walter: John Goodman. Maude: Julianne Moore. Jesus the Bowler: John Turturro. Donny: Steve Buscemi. Written by Joel and Ethan Coen(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Axis Mundi. Season 2 opens in a Texas town that was renamed Miracle for having no departures, but longtime resident John Murphy is skeptical of charlatans and carpetbaggers who are trying to profit from this good fortune. Meanwhile, the Murphys welcome new neighbors when Kevin, Nora and Jill relocate from New York, hoping to start a new life(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A Matter of Geography. Nora gets an offer on her house from an unlikely buyer with a morbid curiosity, but the money could come in handy when she and Jill are on board with Kevin's impulsive suggestion to leave Mapleton behind(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Off Ramp. Laurie works on a book to expose the evils of the Guilty Remnant, and rents office space to serve as a refuge for individuals fleeing the cult, while Tom goes undercover in the silent sanctuaries to rescue lost souls from its clutches(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Orange Sticker. An earthquake rocks Miracle in the middle of the night, but Nora has no idea where Kevin is, and when he finally comes home he can't remember where he was or what happened to his phone. Meanwhile, Evie's disappearance has the Murphys reeling; and an old adversary makes her presence felt(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: No Room at the Inn. Matt and Mary leave Miracle to see if they can learn more about her condition, but their lives are turned upside down when they're not allowed back into town and must deal with the mob of desperate squatters that lingers just outside the gates(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Lens. Surprise visitors irk Nora as she becomes preoccupied with self-examination. Meanwhile, Erika finds an unlikely ally; and Kevin's situation is finally plain for all to see(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A Most Powerful Adversary. Nora delivers shocking news to Jill and Kevin, who worries about how to solve his Patti problem. Meanwhile, Laurie makes a startling decision that affects her whole family(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: International Assassin. Kevin hopes to conquer Patti once and for all, in an unusual arena, but any resolution could come at great personal cost(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Ten Thirteen. Meg's path to the Guilty Remnant follows an intense personal loss. Meanwhile, Tom hopes to reunite with Meg after a fallout with his mom(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: I Live Here Now. John is skeptical of Kevin's revelation about the night Evie disappeared. Meanwhile, the fourth anniversary of the Departure brings an unexpected threat to Miracle(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Hilarious follow up to Friday. Now it's Next Friday and Craig is still living with his parents in South Central Los Angeles while looking for a job and remembering his moment of glory four years earlier, when he finally beat local bully, Debo . But now Debo has escaped from prison and is looking to exact revenge on Craig. Craig's dad takes him to Rancho Cucamonga to hide out with his Uncle Elroy and cousin Day-Day, who have moved to the suburbs after winning the lottery. But once he gets there, Craig and his cousin have a string of suburban adventures that make his South Central experiences look tame(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker (Jeff Bridges) gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire (David Huddleston) whose name he shares. Walter: John Goodman. Maude: Julianne Moore. Jesus the Bowler: John Turturro. Donny: Steve Buscemi. Written by Joel and Ethan Coen(n)

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Roy (Nicolas Cage) is an agoraphobic obsessive-compulsive con man who sells water filters at ten times their value, by offering fabulous prizes to the buyers. When difficulties start interfering with their tricks, psychoanalysis appears as an alternative to pills. During the sessions, he begins to suspect he has a daughter (Alison Lohman), whose existence he never dared confirm. When he finally meets her, she is completely fascinated by her father's lifestyle, so much so, that she wants to go into partnership with him. At the casting for this film, Lohman dressed and behaved like a 14-year-old, until, under pressure from Ridley Scott, she admitted to being 22(n)

programme.title: The Bonfire of the Vanities
programme.desc: Controversial adaptation of Tom Wolfe's acerbic novel. A successful Wall Street trader finds his charmed life turned into a shambles(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies(n)

programme.desc: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body and becomes very attached to 'his' unborn baby(n)

programme.desc: A slacker (Jeff Bridges) gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire (David Huddleston) whose name he shares. Walter: John Goodman. Maude: Julianne Moore. Jesus the Bowler: John Turturro. Donny: Steve Buscemi. Written by Joel and Ethan Coen(n)

But as he unexpectedly begins climbing up the corporate ladder, he realises that he doesn't need revenge to earn his daughter's respect, or to become someone else to win the heart of his co-worker(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about an alcoholic millionaire threatened with losing his inheritance if he does not marry the girl of his parents' choosing. Despite his dislike for his prospective bride, he bows to the inevitable only to meet a light-fingered waitress who steals his heart. John Gielgud won an Oscar for his role as Arthur's loyal but outspoken valet(n)

programme.title: Modern Problems
programme.desc: Chaos with Chevy Chase getting nuclear-wasted and developing telekinetic powers. Patti D'Arbanville, Mary Kay Place, Nell Carter, Brian Doyle-Murray. Ken Shapiro directed(n)

programme.title: Immigration Tango
programme.desc: Love crosses international boundaries and makes a big mess en route in this romantic comedy. Carlos Sanchez (Carlos Leon) is from Latin America, and Elena Dubrovnik (Elika Portnoy) is from Russia. Carlos and Elena are in love and living in the United States, but while they'd like to stay, they have a problem -- their visas are soon to expire, and they aren't sure when or if they'll be able to get green cards that will allow them permanent residence. Carlos and Elena are close friends with Mike White (McCaleb Burnett) and Betty Bristol (Ashley Wolfe), who were born and raised in the States. Like Carlos and Elena, Mike and Betty are planning to marry but haven't done so yet, and when they learn of their friends' dilemma, someone comes up with a solution -- Carlos will marry Betty, Mike will marry Elena, and once their respective green cards come through, both couples will divorce and everyone lives happily ever after. However, the plan doesn't go as smoothly as expected -- suspicious immigration agents are keeping a close watch on Carlos and Elena, so the newlyweds have to live with their respective spouses and act happily married in order to maintain the illusion of matrimony, which leads the four friends into a variety of romantic complications. Immigration Tango received its world premiere at the 2010 Boston International Film Festival(n)

When Wang Bao discovers a magical gourd that can instantly grant his every wish, the awkward child suddenly becomes a hero amongst his curious classmates. When the gourd proves more of a burden than a blessing and the boy decides to get rid of it, he quickly discovers that's easier said than done(n)

programme.title: The Wild Life
programme.desc: A restless parrot and his animal pals are shocked when a ragged human known as Robinson Crusoe washes ashore on their tropical island. Later, they decide to team up with Crusoe to save their home from a pair of conniving cats(n)

programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: Chris O'Neil and Rhiannon Leigh Wryn star as siblings Noah and Emma Wilder in Bob Shaye's intelligent family sci-fi adventure drama that doesn't talk down to children. While staying at their family beach house near Seattle, the two find a box of things that look like toys, but prove to be far more mysterious. Sent back in time, the 'toys' are trying to pass on a message about the future. And the more Noah and Emma play with the objects from the box, the more their intelligence grows. But one day Noah lines up the toys and accidentally activates a powerful force that creates a state-wide blackout. With her family under arrest by the FBI, Emma must make sense of the messages Mimzy, the toy rabbit, has been telepathically communicating to her(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, which forces Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger to embark on a journey to save the planet in this winning animated sequel(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

Social drama about the struggles of a dedicated Brooklyn high school teacher. After refusing to pass a violent pupil, the teacher is stabbed and is lucky to survive. He eventually returns to work in Los Angeles and finds himself frustrated by the school's unwillingness to take a hard disciplinary line. Surrounded by pupils who would rather fight than learn, he finds he must develop his own methods for coping with violence(n)

programme.desc: Inspiration 80s style as teacher Molly McGrath's incessant requests to coach finally force the authorities to give her a chance. Molly becomes the only woman in the mens' locker room, but her new squad of rebels are the worst team in the league..(n)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday is forgotten by her family who are distracted by the upcoming wedding of her older sister, and to compound things, she has a crush on a popular older classmate and is suffering the unwanted attentions of a sophomoric geek(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.desc: An aspiring singer-songwriter works in a trendy Manhattan bar where the employees are expected to put on a spirited show for patrons(n)

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Halle Berry star in this sci-fi epic weaving together six stories set in the past, present and future(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: Adam Sandler plays Satan's bumbling, slack-jawed spawn in this devilish, effects-laden comedy. Nicky (Sandler) rises from the fiery depths of hell and enters New York City, where he tries to save the world and his father's life by battling his two supremely evil brothers, who are scheming to upset the balance of good and evil. Patricia Arquette, Harvey Keitel, Rodney Dangerfield(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader, Gotham City's superhero, battles the Joker in Tim Burton's blockbuster(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Forced to spend a Saturday detention in school, five disparate high school kids find that they have more in common than they ever realized. Romantic comedy drama staring Emilio Estevez. (1985)(n)

programme.title: Flowers
programme.desc: A revenge plan against a teacher spins out of control for two Brooklyn teens. The winner of the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biopic charting the life of eccentric film director Howard Hughes over a 20-year period. Breaking into the film industry in 1927, he went on to achieve box-office success, romanced some of his leading ladies and used his millions in an attempt to break the airspeed record(n)

programme.title: Drumline
programme.desc: After decades of movies about college sports, the bands who take the field at halftime finally get their day in the sun in this musical comedy drama. Devon Miles (Nick Cannon) is a talented young percussionist from Harlem who wins a music scholarship to Atlanta A & T, a prestigious African-American university. For years, Atlanta A & T has won awards for their show-style marching band, who combine expert musicianship (incorporating funk, R&B, and jazz rhythms into the traditional marching band repertoire) with choreography, dancing cheerleaders, and roof-raising showmanship. Dr. Aaron Lee (Orlando Jones), the school's band director, gives Devon a spot in the marching band's drumline, the heart and soul of a show-style band, but discovers Devon's previous musical education hardly meets his usual standard when he learns that his new drummer can't read music. Devon soon earns a reputation as a stubborn individualist within the band, not necessarily a good thing in an ensemble where a strictly unified performance is considers the ideal. Devon's cocksure attitude and streetwise style doesn't mesh very comfortably with Sean Taylor (Leonard Roberts), a disciplined senior who resents the presence of the upstart freshman in the drumline, and things become even less harmonious when Devon begins making a play for Laila (Zoe Saldana), a beautiful girl who is also being courted by Sean. Songwriter and record producer Dallas Austin, who has worked with Boyz II Men, TLC, and Pink, served as executive producer for Drumline, helped produce the film's musical score, and contributed his own experiences as a marching band member to the screenplay(n)

programme.title: Above the Law
programme.desc: Action-packed thriller in which a tough unorthodox cop risks his life attempting to smash a deadly drug cartel. The trail leads to a corrupt CIA official who crossed paths with the cop once before, in the jungles of Vietnam. With the aid of his ex-wife, the officer vows to vanquish his enemy once and for all. Steven Seagal developed, co-wrote and choreographed the action in this, his hard-hitting film debut(n)

programme.title: Repo Man

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Docudrama about two young arms dealers who win a $300 million contract to supply weaponry to US forces in Afghanistan(n)

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: Still grieving for the death of his elder brother, who died in infamous cross country race The Crucible, James "Speed" Racer is a talented young driver who decides to enter the race himself. Turning down offers from powerful corrupt companies who are rigging races, he wants to win for the honour of his small family racing business. programme.desc: Col. Terry Childers is a 30-year Marine veteran: a decorated officer with combat experience in Vietnam, Beirut and Desert Storm - a patriot, a hero. But now, the country he served so well has put him on trial for a rescue mission that went terribly wrong. For his attorney, he has chosen Marine Col. Hays Hodges, a comrade-in-arms who owes his life to Childers. Hodges is not the best lawyer in the service, but Childers trusts him as a brother Marine who knows what it's like to risk death under fire. Bound by duty and friendship, Hodges reluctantly takes the case, even as he begins to doubt the man who saved his life in Vietnam three decades ago(n)

programme.title: The Good Guy
programme.desc: After executive producing the acclaimed documentary Manda Bala and the J.M. Coetzee adaptation Disgrace, Julio DePietro makes his feature debut as a writer-director with The Good Guy, a drama about ambitious young Wall Streeters fighting each other -- and sometimes their own decent nature -- to get ahead in the world. Our narrator, Tommy (Scott Porter of TV's Friday Night Lights), is young, clever, charming, and attractive. He's got a smart, pretty girlfriend, Beth (Alexis Bledel of Gilmore Girls), an urban conservationist. He's also very good at his investment broker job, impressing his ruthless, cynical boss, Cash (erstwhile "Brat Pack" member Andrew McCarthy). When a key member of Tommy's sales team suddenly leaves for a competitor, Tommy needs to fill his spot quickly, and takes a chance on the bumbling Daniel (Bryan Greenberg, Bride Wars), a former Marine and computer geek who seems a bit naïve about high finance and a bit nervous around women. Tommy takes Daniel under his wing, showing him how to dress, where to socialize, and how to charm attractive women. Their relationship is threatened when Daniel begins spending more time with Beth, joining her book club, and becoming her confidant. Tommy begins to question his decision to share his wisdom with Daniel, while Daniel is forced to decide what success really means to him, and where his loyalties lie. The Good Guy also stars Anna Chlumsky (In the Loop) and Aaron Yoo (Disturbia). The film had its world premiere at the 2009 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process(n)

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Expanding on their Saturday Night Live characters, John Belushi and Dan Aykroyd star as Jake and Elwood Blues, two white boys with black soul. Sporting cool shades and look-alike suits, Jake and Elwood are dispatched on a "mission from God" by their former teacher, Sister Mary Stigmata (Kathleen Freeman). Said mission is to raise $5000 to save an orphanage. In the course of their zany adventures, the Blues Brothers run afoul of neo-Nazi Henry Gibson, perform the theme from Rawhide before the most unruly bar crowd in written history, and lay waste to hundreds of cars on the streets and freeways of Chicago. In case you aren't swept up in the infectuous nuttiness of the brothers Blue, you might have fun spotting film's legion of guest stars, including James Brown, Cab Calloway, Aretha Franklin, Ray Charles, John Candy, Carrie Fisher, Steve Lawrence, Twiggy, Paul Reubens (aka Pee-Wee Herman), Frank Oz, and Steven Spielberg(n)

The daughter of the US President has disappeared into the now-deadly Los Angeles with the crucial black box. programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: A lawman is torn between justice and personal vengeance in this action drama. Alex Cross (Tyler Perry) is a detective and forensic psychologist who works for the Detroit Police Department with his partner Tommy Kane (Edward Burns) and promising rookie Monica Ashe (Rachel Nichols). While Cross is dedicated to his work, he's just as committed to his home life, and is excited to learn he and his wife Maria (Carmen Ejogo) will be welcoming a third child. When a wealthy and well-connected woman is found dead and partially dismembered in her mansion, police chief Richard Brookwell (John C. McGinley) assigns Cross and his team to the case, and they soon find themselves playing a cat and mouse game with a nameless psychotic (Matthew Fox) with a taste for torture and a grudge against some of the Motor City's wealthiest citizens. Clues point to French financier Leon Mercier (Jean Reno) as the killer's ultimate victim, but Cross and his team suspect Mercier has a secret he isn't willing to share, and the case becomes a personal obsession for Cross when the maniac first kills Monica and then Maria. Also starring Giancarlo Esposito and Cicely Tyson, Alex Cross marked Tyler Perry's debut as an action hero, playing the protagonist of James Patterson's series of best-selling crime novels; Cross was previously played on screen by Morgan Freeman in the films Kiss The Girls and Along Came A Spider(n)

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: After being nominated seven times to the Oscars, Martin Scorsese won the Best Director statuette for this crime thriller starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson and Mark Wahlberg, among other stars. Billy Costigan is a police officer assigned to work undercover with Irish mobster Frank Costello to get evidences to arrest him. On the other side, Colin Sullivan, the informer of Costello, is promoted in the Massachusetts State Police. The Departed also received the Best Picture Academy Award(n)

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: Denzel Washington gives an Oscar-winning performance as a corrupt undercover Los Angeles cop tutoring an idealistic rookie(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set within the architecture of the mind. Written, directed and produced by Oscar® and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award® winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar® nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon)(n)

Tracy's mother - the indomitable and stuck-in-the-past Edna - has her eyes opened by her daughter and her new friends, and encourages Tracy in her campaign to integrate the all-white Corny Collins Show. programme.desc: Feature-length period drama based on the book by Kate Summerscale. Inspector Jack Whicher is part of the newly formed Scotland Yard detective department and travels to Rode, Wiltshire, to investigate a murder at a country house. With no material evidence and only an inept local police force to help, he faces the unenviable task of solving a case in which members of the grieving family are the main suspects. programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. programme.title: The Grand
programme.desc: Esme is confronted by a voice from her past, while Ruth has to act quickly to avoid discovery. Period drama, starring Susan Hampshire and Victoria Scarborough.(n)

programme.title: Rebecca

The new bride tries to escape the shadow of the deceased woman and begins to unravel the story of her death, but it seems the staff, Rebecca's cousin and even her own husband are all keeping secrets. Diana Rigg, Charles Dance and Emilia Fox star.(n)
